desc: Students explore great works in Nordic literature from the medieval period through the 20th century, including mythology, sagas, folktales and works by eminent writers such as Holberg, Hans Christian Andersen, Ibsen, Strindberg and Hamsun. The focus is on literary development in its historical and cultural context. Readings, lectures, speaking and written assignments are in English.
name: Nordic Literature-Tr
title: Nordic Literature: Medieval to Modern
